cta_whatsapp_message: Hello, I am interested in Flora Isle. Please contact me.
project_info_title: Exclusive coastal retreat on Dubai Islands
project_info_text:
Flora Isle unveils a lifestyle of tranquility where luxurious design meets the serenity of the sea. Located on Dubai Islands in Deira, the project offers refined apartments that blend modern elegance with world-class amenities and captivating waterfront views.

This island sanctuary harmonizes urban vitality with coastal calm, creating a sophisticated residential experience in one of Dubai’s emerging premium waterfront destinations.
amenities_title: Infrastructure and landscaping of the residential complex
project_summary_subtitle: Refined waterfront apartments by Flora Realty
map_text: Flora Isle is located in Deira, Dubai Islands — a fast-growing waterfront district that combines beachside tranquility with convenient access to central Dubai. Residents enjoy proximity to key city landmarks while living in a peaceful island environment.
footer_tagline: Luxury waterfront apartments on Dubai Islands
